output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CMF11240017" which indicates this is electoral material 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram with significant reach (10,000-14,999 impressions) 4. Electoral objective: Yes, promotes government achievements under Marcel Ciolacu's leadership 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content 6. Personal opinion: No, this is a structured campaign message with official CMF number
This post was created and running after the end of the presidential campaign period, promoting a presidential candidate (Marcel Ciolacu) through highlighting his government's achievements. The presence of the CMF number and campaign hashtag "#caleasigurapentruromania" further confirms this is campaign material.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official campaign identifier (CMF) - Directly promotes Marcel Ciolacu's achievements as PM - Uses campaign hashtag - Is a paid advertisement reaching wide audience - Posted and running after campaign period ended
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea campaniei, promovând realizările guvernamentale ale candidatului prezidențial Marcel Ciolacu. Postarea cu ID 3790873984507071 pe Facebook conține număr CMF (11240017), hashtag de campanie și mesaje electorale explicite, fiind o reclamă plătită cu impact între 10.000-14.999 impresii, difuzată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Materialul reprezintă în mod clar propagandă electorală conform Art. 36(7), având obiectiv electoral și adresându-se publicului larg prin intermediul platformelor de social media.
